name: wurwolves
description: A simple werewolves (/ mafia) webapp using a React+Redux frontend with a Python+FastAPI+SQLAlchemy backend, served by a static node server

scripts.start:development: concurrently "cd react-ui && npm start" "alembic upgrade head && uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.build: alembic upgrade head && cd react-ui && npm run build
scripts.install: pip install . && cd react-ui/ && npm install
